name: First Aid
description: At the end of battle, restore 25% HP to an ally.

name: Keen Call
description: Before an ally attacks, grant 100% critical rate for their next attack.

name: Luminous Cover
description: Cover an ally with medium Guard, grants ally 20% Defense.

name: Rapid Order
description: Grant +20 Initiative to all allies.

name: Noble Guard
description: Block enemy attack with medium guard, grants 20% Defense and grants +1 PP if you have 50% Health or less.

name: Arrow Cover
description: Activates before an ally is hit by a ranged phys. attack. Cover an ally and nullify all damage.

name: Quick Guard
description: Activates before being hit by a physical attack. Block an enemy attack with a medium guard.

name: Provoke
description: Activates at the start of a battle. Force a row of enemies to focus attacks on the user. Grants the user +50% Guard Rate.

name: Active Gift
description: Activates after an ally uses an active skill. Grants an ally +1 AP.

name: Parting Blow
description: Activates at the end of a battle. Attacks a single enemy.

name: Frenzied Strike
description: Activates after an ally is hit by an attack. Counterattack a single enemy. Inflicts Phys. Defense -15%.

name: War Horn
description: Activates at the start of a battle. Make all allies attack skills unguardable.

name: Hastened Strike
description: Activates at the start of a battle. Attack a single enemy with a first strike.

name: Parry
description: Activates before being hit by a melee attack. Negate melee damage for a single hit. Grants the user +1 AP.

name: Charged Impetus
description: Activates after using an active skill. Grants the user +1 AP and +50% Critical damage.

name: Following Slash
description: Activates after an ally is hit by an attack. Counterattack a single enemy. Grants the user +1 PP if the attack hits.

name: Vengeful Guard
description: Activates before being hit by a physical attack. Blocks an enemy attack with a medium guard. Grants the user +20% Phys. Attack. (Effect stacks.)

name: Bull Force
description: Activates after using an active skill. Grants the user +1 AP, +20% Phys. Attack, and +20 Initiative.

name: Heavy Cover
description: Activates before an ally is attacked. Cover an ally with a heavy guard.

name: Guardian
description: Activates after being hit by a physical attack. Grants the user +20% Phys. Defense and +20% Guard Rate. (Effect stacks.)

name: Row Cover
description: Activates before an ally is attacked. Cover a row of allies with a medium guard.

name: Bulk Up
description: Activates after being hit by an attack. Recover 40% HP.

name: Wide Counter
description: Activates after an enemy attacks with an active skill. Counterattack a row of enemies.

name: Berserk
description: Activates before attacking with an active skill. Consume all PP to grant the user +1 AP. The user will survive one lethal blow.

name: Binding Guard
description: Activates before attacking with an active skill. User's next attack will inflict Guard Seal.

name: Enrage
description: Activates after an ally is hit by an attack. Grants the user +20% Attack and +20% Accuracy. (Effect stacks.)

name: Heavy Counter
description: Activates after an enemy attacks with an active skill. Counterattack a single enemy. Ignores 100% Defense vs armored targets.

name: Eagle Eye
description: Activates before attacking with an active skill. Makes the user's next attack a truestrike.

name: Pursuit
description: Activates after an ally attacks (Active). Follow-up attack a single enemy.

name: Aerial Snipe
description: Activates after an ally is hit by an attack. Counterattack a single enemy. +100 potency vs flying targets.

name: Medical Aid
description: At the end of battle, heal a row of allies for 15% HP. Double heal if ally is below 50% HP.

name: Quick Reload
description: Activates after using an active skill. Follow-up attack a single enemy.

name: Aid Cover
description: Activates before an ally is attacked. Cover an ally with medium guard and restore 25% HP to that ally.

name: Evade
description: Activates before being attacked. Evade a single hit.

name: Sneaking Edge
description: Activates at the start of a battle. Attack a single enemy with a first strike. Inflicts Guard Seal and Passive Seal.

name: Cavalier Call
description: Activates before attacking with an active skill. Grants cavalry allies in the user's row +20% Attack. (Effect stacks.)

name: Knight's Pursuit
description: Activates after a cavalry-based ally attacks (Active). Follow-up attack a column of enemies with a piercing strike.

name: Magic Barrier
description: Activates before an ally is hit by a magic attack. Negate the next magic damage dealt to an ally. Also negates afflictions.

name: Holy Guard
description: Activates before being hit by a physical attack. Block an enemy attack with a medium guard. Prevents debuffs.

name: Row Barrier
description: Activates before an ally is hit by a magic attack. Negate the next magic damage dealt to a row of allies. Also negates afflictions.

name: Vengeance
description: Activates after being attacked. Grants the user +20% Attack and +20% Defense. (Effect stacks.) Grants the user +1 PP if the user is at 50% HP or less.

name: Sanguine Arts
description: Activates before attacking with an active skill. User will recover HP equal to +50% of damage dealt on next attack.

name: Demonic Pact
description: Activates after using an active skill. Sacrifice 25% HP to grant user +1 AP.

name: Quick Heal
description: Activates after an ally is hit by an attack. Restore minor HP to an ally.

name: Refresh
description: Activates after an ally is debuffed. Remove all debuffs from a row of allies.

name: Lifesaver
description: Activates before being attacked. Heal self for minor HP recovery. Grants user a buff to endure one lethal blow.

name: Parting Resurrection
description: Activates at the end of battle. Revive one ally, restoring them to 1 HP.

name: Quick Curse
description: Activates before an enemy uses an attack skill. Inflicts -20% Attack for a single enemy's Next Attack. Inflicts Critical Seal.

name: Cursed Swamp
description: Activates at the start of a battle. Inflicts -10 Initiative and -30 Evasion on all enemies. Inflicts -1 PP to Cavalry targets

name: Magic Counter
description: Activates after an enemy attacks with an active skill. Counterattack a single enemy with Magic.

name: Magic Pursuit
description: Activates after an ally uses a magic attack (Active). Follow-up attack a single enemy with Magic.

name: Concentrate
description: Grants the user +1 AP and +40 Accuracy.

name: Magic Conferral
description: Activates before an ally attacks with a Physical Active skill. Add Magic damage to an ally's next attack. (50 potency)

name: Focus Sight
description: Activates before an ally attacks with an Active skill. Make an ally's next attack Truestrike.

name: Quick Cast
description: Activates at the start of a battle. Grants the user max initiative for their next action and -50% Critical Rate

name: Ground Counter
description: Activates after an enemy attacks with an active skill. Counterattack a single enemy. +100 potency vs Cavalry targets.

name: Deflect
description: Activates before being hit by a melee attack. Negate melee damage for a single hit. Grants the user +20 Evasion. (Effect stacks.)

name: Dragon's Roar
description: Activates at the start of a battle. Inflicts Initiative -20 on all enemies.

name: Wing Rest
description: Activates at the end of a battle. Recover 25% HP. Recovered HP doubles if Afflicted.

name: Feathering
description: Activates before attacking with an active skill. Grants allies in the user's row +15 initiative.

name: Gryphon Glide
description: Activates before being hit by a ranged attack. Evade a single hit of a ranged attack. Grants the user +1 AP.

name: Sylphic Barrier
description: Activates before an ally is hit by a ranged phys. attack. Allow an ally to Evade one attack.

name: Remove Weakness
description: Activates after the user is debuffed. Remove the user's debuffs. Grants the user a buff to Evade one attack.

name: Evasive Impetus
description: Activates after evading an attack. Grants the user +1 AP.

name: Quick Cure
description: Activates after an ally is debuffed. Remove all debuffs from an ally. Grants the target immunity to one debuff.

name: Selfless Heal
description: Activates after being healed. Restore minor HP to all allies. Removes all debuffs.

name: Pure Field
description: Activates at the start of a battle. Grants all allies a buff that negates a single debuff.

name: Nocturnal Strike
description: Activates at the start of a battle. Attack a single enemy with a first strike. Grants the user +1 PP at Night.

name: Bestral Howl
description: Activates before attacking with an active skill. Grants allies in the user's row +15% Phys. Attack.

name: Killing Pursuit
description: Activates after an ally attacks (Active). Follow-up attack a single enemy. Grants +1 AP if the target is defeated.

name: Nocturnal Evade
description: Activates before being attacked. Evade a single hit. Grants the user +1 PP at Night.

name: Shadow Pursuit
description: Activates after an ally attacks (Active). Follow-up attack a single enemy. Inflicts Blindness.

name: Weakness Hunter
description: Activates after an enemy is debuffed. Attack a single enemy. Ignores 50% of the target's Defense.

name: Heavy Guard
description: Activates before being hit by a physical attack. Block an enemy attack with a heavy guard.

name: Nocturnal Rest
description: Activates after attacking. Recover 30% HP. Recovered HP doubles at Night.

name: Life Blow
description: Activates at the end of a battle. Attacks a single enemy. Deals damage equal to 80% of the users's HP. (This attack cannot be a critical)

name: Restore
description: Activates after an ally uses a passive skill. Grants an ally +1 PP.

name: Quick Dispel
description: Activates after an enemy is buffed. Remove all buffs from a single enemy.

name: Circle Barrier
description: Activates before an ally is attacked. Reduce damage taken by all allies by 25% for one attack.

name: Accelerate
description: Activates after an enemy attacks with an active skill. Grants the user +20 Initiative and +30 Accuracy. (Effect stacks.)

name: Diurnal Guard
description: Activates before being hit by a physical attack. Block enemy attack with medium guard. Grants the user +1 PP during the day.

name: Discharge
description: Activates before attacking with an active skill. Consume all of the user's buffs and increase attack power for one attack. (Number of consumed buffs x 25%)

name: Aerial Pursuit
description: Activates after a flying ally attacks (Active). Follow-up attack a single enemy.

name: Tailwind
description: Activates after using an active skill. Grants a row of allies +10 Initiative. Effect is doubled for flying targets.

name: Shining Light
description: Activates before an enemy uses an attack skill. Inflicts Blindness on a row of enemies.

name: Hastened Heal
description: Activates at the start of a battle. Restore minor HP to all allies. Grants HP regeneration during the day.

name: Preemptive Heal
description: Activates before an ally is attacked. Restore moderate HP to an ally.

name: Holy Breath
description: Activates before an ally attacks with an Active skill. Restore minor HP to an ally. If target is Afflicted, remove the Affliction and grant the user +1 PP

name: Sacrifice
description: Activates before an ally is attacked. Risk one's life to cover an ally. Grants the user +2 PP

name: Holy Barrier
description: Activates before an ally is attacked. Reduce the damage taken by an ally by 50% for one attack. Also prevents them from being afflicted.

name: Guard Order
description: Activates before an ally is attacked. Grants a row of allies +100% Guard Rate for one attack.

name: Sniping Order
description: Activates before an ally attacks with an active skill. Make a row of allies' next attack a truestrike.

name: Artenie Strike
description: Activates at the start of a battle. Attack a single enemy with a first strike. Grants the user +2 PP if the target is defeated.

name: Shattering Pursuit
description: Activates after an ally attacks (Active). Follow-up attack a column of enemies with a piercing strike. Inflicts Phys. Defense -25%.

name: Phalanx Shift
description: Activates after an ally is attacked with an active skill. Buff a row of allies. Grants +20% Attack and +40% Critical Rate vs Cavalry targets.

name: Aerial Shift
description: Activates after an ally is attacked with an active skill. Buff a row of allies. Grants +20% Attack and +40% Critical Rate vs Flying targets.

name: Healing Hunter
description: Activates after an enemy uses healing magic. Attack a single enemy. Ignores 30% of the target's Defense.

name: Rapid Shot
description: Activates at the start of a battle. Attack a single enemy with a first strike. Inflicts Stun.

name: Magic Burst
description: Activates after an enemy attacks with an active skill. Counterattack all enemies with magic. Inflicts Initiative -10.

name: Protection
description: Activates before an ally is attacked. Reduce the damage taken by a row of allies by 50% for one attack.

name: Quick Barrier
description: Activates before an ally is attacked. Reduce the damage taken by an ally by 50% for one attack.

name: Sacred Cure
description: Activates after an ally is debuffed. Remove all debuffs from a row of allies. Grants targets immunity to one debuff.

name: Reheal
description: Activates at the start of a battle. Grants a row of allies HP Regeneration.

name: Magic Shell
description: Activates at the start of a battle. Complete negate attacks up to three hits.

name: Hastened Curse
description: Activates at the start of a battle. Inflicts -30 Initiative on a single enemy.

name: Guard Hunter
description: Activates after an enemy guards an attack. Attack a single enemy with magic. Ignores 30% of the target's Defense.

name: Poison Burst
description: Activates at the end of a battle. Attack a single enemy with magic. Hits all enemies if target is poisoned.

name: Fire Burst
description: Activates at the end of a battle. Attack a single enemy with magic. Hits all enemies if target is poisoned.

name: Hastened Cover
description: Activates before an ally is attacked. Cover an ally with a medium guard. Grants that ally max initiative for their next action.

name: Enduring Guard
description: Activates before being hit by a physical attack. Block an enemy attack with a heavy guard. Grants the user a buff to endure one lethal blow.

name: Radiant Cover
description: Activates before an ally is attacked. Cover an ally with a medium guard. Makes that ally's next attack truestrike.

name: Quick Cover
description: Activates before an ally is attacked. Cover an ally with a medium guard.

name: Nocturnal Guard
description: Activates before being hit by a physical attack. Block an enemy attack with a medium guard. Grants the user +1 PP at Night.

name: Royal Guard
description: Activates before being hit by a physical attack. Block an enemy attack with a medium guard. User recovers 25% HP.

name: Bestral Guard
description: Activates before being hit by a physical attack. Block an enemy attack with a medium guard. Becomes a heavy guard and grants the user +1 PP if the enemy is a bestral.

name: Aerial Guard
description: Activates before being hit by a physical attack. Block an enemy attack with a medium guard. Becomes a heavy guard and grants the user +1 PP if the enemy is a flying.

name: Cavalry Guard
description: Activates before being hit by a physical attack. Block an enemy attack with a medium guard. Becomes a heavy guard and grants the user +1 PP if the enemy is a cavalry.

name: Lifeshare
description: Activates after an ally is hit by an attack. Share HP with an ally (50% of the user's HP).

name: Enduring Cover
description: Activates before an ally is attacked. Cover an ally with a heavy guard. Grants the user a buff to endure one lethal blow.

name: Invincible
description: Activates before being attacked. Completely negate the next attack received.

name: Provoking Wall
description: Activates at the start of a battle. Force a row of enemies to focus attacks on the user. User will negate one physical attack.

name: Bunker Stance
description: Activates at the start of a battle. Grants the user -30 Initiative, +40% Phys. Defense, and +40% Guard Rate.

name: Maidens Hammer
description: Activates after an enemy attacks ith an active skill. Counterattack a single enemy. Potency increases the less HP the user has. (Maximum increase: +100)

name: Iron Veil
description: Activates at the start of a battle. Grants +50% Guard Rate and +30% Phys. Defense to all allies.

name: Undying Will
description: Activates before attacking with an active skill. Attack potency increases as HP decreases. (Max: +100) Grants the ability to survive one lethal blow.

name: Passive Miracle
description: Activates after receiving an ally's passive skill. Restore minor HP and grant +1 PP to an ally.

name: Saints Barrier
description: Activates before an ally is attacked. Reduce damage taken by an ally by 50% for one attack. Also prevents them from being debuffed.

name: Divine Blessing
description: Activates at the start of a battle. Grants all allies HP regeneration and +10% Defense.

name: Curing Heal
description: Activates after an ally is hit by an attack. Restore minor HP to an ally. Remove all of their debuffs.

name: Rage of the Faeries
description: Activates at the start of a battle. Attack a row of enemies with a magic first strike. Inflicts Stun. Grants the user +1 summoned faeries.

name: Elemental Impetus
description: Activates after using an active skill. Grants the user +1 AP and +1 summoned faeries.

name: Boon of the Faeries
description: Activates at the start of a battle. Restore moderate HP to a row of allies. Grants a buff that negates a single debuff. Grants the user +1 summoned faeries.

name: Triple Counter
description: Activates after an enemy attacks with an active skill. Counterattack three enemies.

name: Snow-white Strike
description: Activates after an ally attacks (Active). Follow-up attack a single enemy. Inflicts Freeze. +100 potency vs frozen targets.

name: Wild Kick
description: Activates after an enemy guards against an ally's attack. Attack a single enemy. Inflicts Stun and Guard Seal.

name: Hawk Eye
description: Activates before attacking with an active skill. Makes the user's next attack a truestrike and a guaranteed critical.

name: Advance Cover
description: Activates before an ally is attacked. Cover an ally with a medium guard. Grants the user +1 AP.

name: Phantom Counter
description: Activates after an enemy attacks with an active skill. Counterattack a single enemy. Inflicts Burn and removes all of target's Buffs.

name: Parting Death
description: Activates at the end of a battle. Attack a single enemy. Inflicts Deathblow if the target has 50% HP or less.

name: Sanguine Pursuit
description: Activates after an ally attacks with an active skill. Follow-up attack a single enemy. User recovers HP equal to 50% of damage dealt. Grants the user +1 PP vs afflicted targets.

name: Eye of the Warrior Princess
description: Activates at the start of a battle. Inflicts Attack -20% and Initiative -10 on all enemies.

name: Painbringer
description: Activates before being attacked. Grants the user +1 AP, +20% Attack, and +10 Initiative. (Effect stacks.)

name: Scornful Dead
description: Activates at the start of a battle. Force all enemies to focus attacks on the user. User will evade attacks up to two hits.

name: Evil Cover
description: Activates before an ally is attacked. Cover an ally with a medium guard. Steals 1 PP from that ally.

name: Dark Step
description: Activates before being attacked. Evade a single hit. Grants the user +25 Evasion.

name: Dark Conferral
description: Activates before an ally attacks with a Physical Active skill. Add magical damage and Blindness to an ally's next attack. (50 potency)

name: Cursed Gaol
description: Activates before an enemy uses an active skill. Inflicts Attack -50% to a single enemy. Inflicts Critical Seal

name: Ominous Wall
description: Activates at the start of a battle. Grants all allies a buff that negates one attack.
